definition: to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)

sentences.english: Vaudeville was very popular in the United States during the early nineteen hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 在二十世纪初期，歌舞杂耍在美国城乡深受欢迎。

sentences.english: But this is mostly a sideshow.
sentences.chinese: 但是这最多像是一个杂耍。

sentences.english: A common juggling problem occurs when two clubs collide in the air.
sentences.chinese: 一个常见的杂耍问题发生时两家具乐部在空中相撞。

sentences.english: Below, the crowd was flinging coins at the jugglers.
sentences.chinese: 他们下面，围观人群向杂耍艺人扔着硬币。

sentences.english: Juggling with four clubs requires mastering the three-club juggle.
sentences.chinese: 有四支球队杂耍需要掌握三个俱乐部变戏法。

sentences.english: Try the book Juggling for the Complete Klutz.
sentences.chinese: 不妨看看《笨蛋如何玩杂耍》这本书。

sentences.english: They were starting a sideshow called The Curious Citizens.
sentences.chinese: 他们正开始上演一场名为‘怪异人物’的杂耍戏。

sentences.english: Learn about three balls juggling in this free juggling video.
sentences.chinese: 了解有关在这三个球的杂耍杂技免费视频。

sentences.english: The mayor talks like a vaudeville comedian in his public addresses.
sentences.chinese: 在公共演讲中，这位市长讲起话来像个歌舞杂耍演员。

sentences.english: Is juggling a ball while wearing a red nose and seal flippers “sport”?
sentences.chinese: 难道戴着红鼻子穿着脚蹼杂耍似的玩球就是“体育”？

sentences.english: When I was 12, I learned to juggle on the side of a gravel hill with oranges.
sentences.chinese: 我十二岁是，我学会了在沙土丘边用橘子杂耍。

sentences.english: Buddie loves learning tricks and, of all my four dogs, he learns tricks the most quickly.
sentences.chinese: 他很喜欢学习一些杂耍，在四只狗中，他学得最快。

sentences.english: I followed the jugglers and I stood by idly.
sentences.chinese: 我跟着这些杂耍师并呆呆地站着。

sentences.english: They saw us jousting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 他们看见我们在广场杂耍。

sentences.english: Tang and Song Dynasties when the lights began to appear all kinds of juggling skills ShangXi.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋时灯市上开始出现各式杂耍技艺。

sentences.english: Several men stood outside the ground, touting for the various sideshows.
sentences.chinese: 好几个人站在场外，为正在演出的各类杂耍招徕观众。

definition: variant of 打把勢|打把势[da3 ba3 shi5]
to get a monkey to perform tricks/to put on a monkey show/to make fun of sb/to tease
